verses.verse: And <WG2532> Are Gathered Together <WG4863> To <WG4314> Him <WG846> The <WG3588> Pharisees <WG5330> And <WG2532> Some <WG5100> Of The <WG3588> Scribes, <WG1122> Having Come <WG2064> From <WG575> Jerusalem; <WG2414>

And <WG2532> Having Seen <WG1492> Some <WG5100> <WG3588> <WG3101> Of His Disciples <WG846> With Defiled <WG2839> Hands, <WG5495> ' That <WG5124> Is <WG2076> Unwashed, <WG449> Eating <WG2068> Bread, <WG740> They Found Fault; <WG3201>

<WG3588> For The <WG1063> Pharisees <WG5330> And <WG2532> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> Jews, <WG2453> <WG1437> Unless <WG3361> ? With The Fist? <WG4435> They Wash <WG3538> The <WG3588> Hands, <WG5495> <WG3756> Eat Not, <WG2068> Holding <WG2902> The <WG3588> Tradition <WG3862> Of The <WG3588> Elders; <WG4245>

And On Coming <WG2532> From <WG575> The Market, <WG58> <WG1437> Unless <WG3361> They Wash Themselves <WG907> <WG3756> They Eat Not; <WG2068> And <WG2532> Other Things <WG243> Many <WG4183> There Are <WG2076> Which <WG3739> They Received <WG3880> To Hold, <WG2902> Washings <WG909> Of Cups <WG4221> And <WG2532> Vessels <WG3582> And <WG2532> Brazen Utensils <WG5473> And <WG2532> Couches : <WG2825>

Then <WG1899> Question <WG1905> Him <WG846> The <WG3588> Pharisees <WG5330> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Scribes, <WG1122> <WG1223> Why <WG5101> <WG3588> <WG3101> Thy Disciples <WG4675> <WG3756> Walk Not <WG4043> According To <WG2596> The <WG3588> Tradition <WG3862> Of The <WG3588> Elders, <WG4245> But <WG235> With Unwashed <WG449> Hands <WG5495> Eat <WG2068> <WG3588> Bread? <WG740>

<WG3588> But He <WG1161> Answering <WG611> Said <WG2036> <WG846> To Them, <WG3754> Well <WG2573> Prophesied <WG4395> Isaiah <WG2268> Concerning <WG4012> You, <WG5216> <WG3588> Hypocrites, <WG5273> As <WG5613> It Has Been Written, <WG1125> This <WG3778> <WG3588> People <WG2992> With The <WG3588> Lips <WG5491> Me <WG3165> <WG5091> <WG3588> Honour, <WG1161> <WG2588> But Their Heart <WG846> Far <WG4206> Is Away <WG568> ' From <WG575> Me. <WG1700>
<WG3155> But In Vain <WG1161> They Worship <WG4576> Me, <WG3165> Teaching As <WG1321> Teachings <WG1319> Injunctions <WG1778> Of Men. <WG444>

<WG863> For, Leaving <WG1063> The <WG3588> Commandment <WG1785> <WG3588> Of God, <WG2316> Ye Hold <WG2902> The <WG3588> Tradition <WG3862> <WG3588> Of Men, <WG444> Washings <WG909> Of Vessels <WG3582> And <WG2532> Cups, <WG4221> And <WG2532> Other <WG243> Like Things <WG3946> Such <WG5108> Many <WG4183> Ye Do. <WG4160>

And <WG2532> He Said <WG3004> To Them, <WG846> Well <WG2573> Do Ye Set Aside <WG114> The <WG3588> Commandment <WG1785> <WG3588> Of God, <WG2316> That <WG2443> <WG3588> <WG3862> Your Tradition <WG5216> Ye May Observe. <WG5083>

<WG3475> For Moses <WG1063> Said, <WG2036> Honour <WG5091> <WG3588> <WG3962> Thy Father <WG4675> And <WG2532> <WG3588> <WG3384> Thy Mother; <WG4675> And, <WG2532> He Who <WG3588> Speaks Evil Of <WG2551> Father <WG3962> Or <WG2228> Mother <WG3384> By Death <WG2288> Let Him Die. <WG5053>

<WG5210> But Ye <WG1161> Say, <WG3004> If <WG1437> Say <WG2036> A Man <WG444> <WG3588> To Father <WG3962> Or <WG2228> <WG3588> Mother, It Is <WG3384> A Corban, <WG2878> that <WG3739> Is, <WG2076> <WG1435> A Gift, <WG3739> Whatever <WG1437> From <WG1537> Me <WG1700> Thou Mightest Be Profited By : <WG5623>

And <WG2532> No Longer <WG3765> Ye Suffer <WG863> Him <WG846> Anything (lit. Nothing) <WG3762> To Do <WG4160> <WG3588> <WG3962> For His Father <WG846> Or <WG2228> <WG3588> <WG3384>, His Mother, <WG846>

Making Void <WG208> The <WG3588> Word <WG3056> <WG3588> Of God <WG2316> <WG3588> <WG3862> By Your Tradition <WG5216> Which <WG3739> Ye Have Delivered; <WG3860> And <WG2532> Like Things <WG3946> Such <WG5108> Many <WG4183> Ye Do. <WG4160>
And <WG2532> Having Called To Him <WG4341> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> Crowd, <WG3793> He Said <WG3004> To Them, <WG846> Hear Ye <WG191> Me, <WG3450> All, <WG3956> And <WG2532> Understand : <WG4920>

Nothing <WG3762> There Is <WG2076> From Without <WG1855> The <WG3588> Man <WG444> Entering <WG1531> Into <WG1519> Him, <WG846> Which <WG3739> Is Able <WG1410> Him <WG846> To Defile; <WG2840> But <WG235> The Things Which <WG3588> Go Out <WG1607> ' From <WG575>, Him, <WG846> Those <WG1565> Are <WG2076> The Things Which <WG3588> Defile <WG2840> The <WG3588> Man. <WG444>
If <WG1487> Anyone <WG5100> Have <WG2192> Ears <WG3775>, To Hear, <WG191> Let Him Hear. <WG191>

And <WG2532> When <WG3753> He Went <WG1525> Into <WG1519> A House <WG3624> From <WG575> The <WG3588> Crowd, <WG3793> Asked <WG1905> Him <WG846> <WG3588> <WG3101> His Disciples <WG846> Concerning <WG4012> The <WG3588> Parable. <WG3850>

And <WG2532> He Says <WG3004> To Them, <WG846> Thus <WG3779> Also <WG2532> Ye <WG5210> Without Understanding <WG801> Are? <WG2075> <WG3756> Perceive Ye Not <WG3539> That <WG3754> Everything <WG3956> Which <WG3588> From Without <WG1855> Enters <WG1531> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Man <WG444> <WG3756> Is Not Able <WG1410> Him <WG846> To Defile? <WG2840>

Because <WG3754> <WG3756> It Enters Not <WG1531> Of Him <WG846> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Heart, <WG2588> ' But <WG235> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Belly, <WG2836> And <WG2532> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Draught <WG856> Goes Out, <WG1607> Purifying <WG2511> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> Food. <WG1033>
<WG3004> And He Said, <WG1161> That <WG3754> Which <WG3588> Out Of <WG1537> The <WG3588> Man <WG444> Goes Forth, <WG1607> That <WG1565> Defiles <WG2840> The <WG3588> Man. <WG444>

<WG2081> For From Within <WG1063> Out Of <WG1537> The <WG3588> Heart <WG2588> <WG3588> Of Men <WG444> <WG3588> Reasonings <WG1261> <WG3588> Evil <WG2556> Go Forth, <WG1607>, Adulteries, <WG3430> Fornications, <WG4202> Murders, <WG5408>
Thefts, <WG2829> Covetous Desires, <WG4124> Wickednesses, <WG4189> Guile, <WG1388> Licentiousness, <WG766> An Eye <WG3788> Wicked, <WG4190> Blasphemy, <WG988> Haughtiness, <WG5243> Folly : <WG877>
All <WG3956> These <WG5023> <WG3588> Evils <WG4190> From Within <WG2081> Go Forth, <WG1607> And <WG2532> Defile <WG2840> The <WG3588> Man. <WG444>

And <WG2532> Thence <WG1564> Having Risen Up <WG450> He Went Away <WG565> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Borders <WG3181> Of Tyre <WG5184> And <WG2532> Sidon; <WG4605> And <WG2532> Having Entered <WG1525> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> House, <WG3614> No One <WG3762> He Wished <WG2309> To Know It, <WG1097> And <WG2532> <WG3756> He Could Not <WG1410> Be Hid. <WG2990>

Having Heard <WG191> For <WG1063> A Woman <WG1135> About <WG4012> Him, <WG846> Of Whom <WG3739> Had <WG2192> <WG3588> <WG2365> Her Little Daughter <WG846> A Spirit <WG4151> Unclean, <WG169> Having Come <WG2064> Fell <WG4363> At <WG4314> <WG3588> <WG4228> His Feet, <WG846>

<WG2258> now Was <WG1161> The <WG3588> Woman <WG1135> A Greek, <WG1674> Syrophoenician <WG4949> <WG3588> By Race, <WG1085> And <WG2532> Asked <WG2065> Him <WG846> That <WG2443> The <WG3588> Demon <WG1140> He Should Cast Forth <WG1544> Out Of <WG1537> <WG3588> Daughter <WG2364> Her. <WG846>

<WG3588> But <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> Said <WG2036> To Her, <WG846> Suffer <WG863> First <WG4412> To Be Satisfied <WG5526> The <WG3588> Children; <WG5043> <WG3756> For Not <WG1063> Good <WG2570> Is It <WG2076> To Take <WG2983> The <WG3588> Bread <WG740> Of The <WG3588> Children, <WG5043> And <WG2532> Cast It <WG906> To The <WG3588> Dogs. <WG2952>

<WG3588> But She <WG1161> Answered <WG611> And <WG2532> Says <WG3004> To Him, <WG846>, Yea, <WG3483> Lord; <WG2962> <WG2532> For Even <WG1063> The <WG3588> Little Dogs <WG2952> Under <WG5270> The <WG3588> Table <WG5132> Eat <WG2068> Of <WG575> The <WG3588> Crumbs <WG5589> Of The <WG3588> Children. <WG3813>

And <WG2532> He Said <WG2036> To Her, <WG846> Because Of <WG1223> This <WG5126> <WG3588> Word <WG3056> Go; <WG5217> Has Gone Forth <WG1831> The <WG3588> Demon <WG1140> Out Of <WG1537> <WG3588> <WG2364> Thy Daughter. <WG4675>

And <WG2532> Having Gone Away <WG565> To <WG1519> <WG3588> <WG3624> Her House, <WG846> She Found <WG2147> The <WG3588> Demon <WG1140> Had Gone Forth, <WG1831> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Daughter <WG2364> Laid <WG906> On <WG1909> The <WG3588> Bed. <WG2825>

And <WG2532> Again <WG3825> Having Departed <WG1831> From <WG1537> The <WG3588> Borders <WG3725> Of Tyre <WG5184> And <WG2532> Sidon, <WG4605> He Came <WG2064> To <WG4314> The <WG3588> Sea <WG2281> <WG3588> Of Galilee, <WG1056> Through The <WG303> Midst <WG3319> Of The <WG3588> Borders <WG3725> Of Decapolis. <WG1179>

And <WG2532> They Bring <WG5342> To Him <WG846> A Deaf Man <WG2974> Who Spoke With Difficulty, <WG3424> And <WG2532> They Beseech <WG3870> Him <WG846> That <WG2443> He Might Lay <WG2007> On Him His <WG846> <WG3588> Hand. <WG5495>

And <WG2532> Having Taken Away <WG618> Him <WG846> From <WG575> The <WG3588> <WG3793> ' Crowd <WG2596> Apart, <WG2398> He Put <WG906> <WG3588> <WG1147> His Fingers <WG846> To <WG1519> <WG3588> Ears <WG3775> His, <WG846> And <WG2532> Having Spit <WG4429> He Touched <WG680> <WG3588> <WG1100> His Tongue, <WG846>

And <WG2532> Having Looked Up <WG308> To <WG1519> The <WG3588> Heaven <WG3772> He Groaned, <WG4727> And <WG2532> Says <WG3004> To Him, <WG846> <WG2188> Ephphatha, <WG3739> That Is, <WG2076> Be Opened. <WG1272>

And <WG2532> Immediately <WG2112> Were Opened <WG1272> His <WG846> <WG3588> Ears, <WG189> And <WG2532> Was Loosed <WG3089> The <WG3588> Band <WG1199> <WG3588> <WG1100> Of His Tongue, <WG846> And <WG2532> He Spoke <WG2980> Rightly. <WG3723>

And <WG2532> He Charged <WG1291> Them <WG846> That <WG2443> No One <WG3367> They Should Tell. <WG2036> <WG3745> But As Much As <WG1161> He <WG846> Them <WG846> Charged, <WG1291> Exceeding <WG3123> <WG4054> They Proclaimed It : <WG2784>

And <WG2532> Above Measure <WG5249> They Were Astonished, <WG1605> Saying, <WG3004> Well <WG2573> All Things <WG3956> He Has Done : <WG4160> Both <WG2532> The <WG3588> Deaf <WG2974> He Makes <WG4160> To Hear, <WG191> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Dumb <WG216> To Speak. <WG2980>
